name: v0.4.4 with (some) Tatoeba examples
body: This version adds the display of some examples from Tatoeba (https://tatoeba.org/eng/) in English.

name: v0.4.3 bugfix release
body:
This version fixes several UI bugs: 
- loss of focus when going back to search view
- search box not opened when going back to bookmarks view
- results without term on app opening and sharing / text action from other apps not working.

name: v0.4.2 bugfix release
body: This version adds support for screen rotation and fixes several scroll-related bugs.

name: v0.4.2rc1 bugfix release
body: This version adds support for screen rotation and removes a scroll bug when bookmarking items in the search view.

name: v0.4.1 bugfix release
body: This release fixes many small bugs and improves reverse search.

name: v0.4.0 with romaji and reverse search
body:
This new version introduces the following features:
- search is possible from either romaji (hepburn or kunrei), hiragana, katakana
- reverse search using terms from the selected language (english or other) is possible.

name: v0.4.0beta2 with corrections
body:
This new beta version of v0.4.0 introduces the following features:
- dictionary translations are back to being all included
- proper display of readings (with hiragana and katakana contents) has been restored
- reverse search ordering has been improved

name: v0.4.0beta1 with reverse search and romaji/kana readings search
body:
This beta version of v0.4.0 introduces the following features:
- dictionary translations now have to be downloaded from the settings
- contents of translation for current language are included in search
- readings can be searched using either hepburn/kunrei romaji, hiragana or katakana

It also includes proper support for Android 4.0.x.

Dictionaries cannot yet be upgraded once they are installed.

name: v0.3.8.3rc1 with proper support for Android 4.x
body: This release candidate corrects support for Android 4.x by embedding the most recent sqlite version from requery.

name: v0.3.8.2 Bookmarks View UI fix
body: This release shows the search box closed by default in Bookmarks View so that the share action can be used

name: v0.3.8.1 displays Query Term
body: This release shows for which term the search results are displayed.

name: v0.3.8 with Bookmark Search
body: This release allows you to search in the bookmarks.

name: v0.3.7 with Part of Speech information
body: This release allows for displaying Part of Speech information as specified in JMdict.

name: v0.3.6.1 bugfix release
body: Bookmarks were not displayed when going back to the bookmark view from the search view: this release fixes the issue.

name: v0.3.6 with compact interface
body: This release introduces a redesigned compact user interface.

name: v0.3.5 adding multilingual support
body:
This release supports displaying translation in all the languages supported by JMdict:
English, German, French, Russian, Dutch, Spanish, Hungarian, Slovenian, Swedish.

name: v0.3.4rc1 bugfix release candidate 1
body:
The next release will include the following improvements:
- Fixed sharing of text from other apps
- Fixed main view navigation
- Fixed dictionary query handling

name: v0.3.3 adding logs display and sharing
body: This releases include a new log display feature accessible from the new Settings view, allowing easier sharing of debug data from user to developer.

name: v0.3.2 allowing word search from any app
body:
This release includes:
- search selected text in applications using contextual menu (or sharing)
- search status display (progress bar when no results found yet, message when no results found).

name: v0.3.1 with faster search and bookmarks export/import
body:
This releases introduces:
- faster search
- better implementation of bookmarks
- UI bug fixes
- bookmarks export/import.

name: v0.3.0 with database migrated to room
body:
This is the first release to use room for database usage.

We hope for better performance and less memory use.

The search results is now an endless list that will grow as you scroll further down.

name: v0.2.2 with navigation drawer
body: This release introduces a navigation drawer, which will allow to switch between different screens in the future.

name: v0.2.1 with new search logic
body:
Changed logic to search words in the dictionary, to enable possibility to search elements that have readings but no writings.

Added status message in case the search returned no elements.

Corrected version display in about box.

name: v0.2 with improved search UI and performance
body: The search UI was redesigned with an icon search button and a cross to cancel input, the progress bar is thinner and shows progress while the search results list is being built, and the search performance is better due to database optimization.

name: Initial release of v0.1
body: This is the first publicly available release of Sumatora Dictionary.
